tutorialSteps.topText: Rock Blobs have entered the board! Mergable blobs will try to merge with Rocks but it won't work. Instead, Rocks will block direct merges.
tutorialSteps.bottomText: Try merging the blue Blob with the rock above it.

tutorialSteps.topText: The Rock Blob prevented the merge! This also means they can never be cleared, but they can still be helpful for positioning other Blobs.
tutorialSteps.bottomText: Rocks will be cleared on their own after no other blobs remain. Try positioning the purple blob in line with the blue blob.

tutorialSteps.topText: Finish the level by merging the pink blob with the Flag!
